Nausea and morning 
sickness
Nausea is very common in 
the early weeks of pregnancy. 
Some women feel sick, and 
some are sick. It can happen 
at	any	time	of	day	â€“	or	even	all	
day long.
Hormonal	changes	in	the	first	
three months are probably 
one cause. Nausea usually 
disappears around the 12th 
to 14th week. This can be one 
of the most trying problems in 
early pregnancy. It comes at a 
7
